comments.enabled: Set to false to disable capability injection globally
comments.maxTokens: Maximum tokens for capability injection per session
comments.allowWorkspaceCards: Allow loading capabilities from workspace (security: default false)
comments.forceInclude: Array of capability IDs to always inject (regardless of router tags)
comments.exclude: Array of capability IDs to never inject
comments.autoDisableThreshold: Kill switch: disable if >X% sessions trigger injection (0-1)
comments.autoDisableWindowHours: Kill switch time window in hours
